data.content: In this lesson, you will attempt a variety of comprehension and grammar activities based on two stories titled Goodnight, Tinku! and The Boy and the Drum.

• You will be able to understand the specific details of a story and follow the theme based on audio cues.
  • You will be able to talk about human qualities and answer simple questions about others.
  • You will be able to write short sentences on topics like being kind and answer simple questions about others.
